nextly-is-a-free-landing-page-and-market: Nextly is a free landing page & marketing website template for startups and indie projects. Its built with Next.js & TailwindCSS. And its completely open-source.
testimonial-benefit: Share a real testimonial that hits some of your benefits from one of your popular customer.
testimonial-benefit-2: Make sure you only pick the right sentence to keep it short and simple.
testimonial-benefit-3: This is an awesome landing page template I've seen. I would use this for anything.
hero_header_websiteDescription: Free Landing Page Template for startups
hero_body_description: Nextly is a free landing page & marketing website template for startups and indie projects. Its built with Next.js & TailwindCSS. And its completely open-source.
index_benefits_title: Why should you use this landing page
index_benefits_bodyDescription: Nextly is a free landing page & marketing website template for startups and indie projects. Its built with Next.js & TailwindCSS. And its completely open-source.
index_video_title: Learn how to fullfil your needs
index_video_bodyDescription: This section is to highlight a promo or demo video of your product. Analysts says a landing page with video has 3% more conversion rate. So, don't forget to add one. Just like this.
index_testimonials_bodyDescription: Testimonails is a great way to increase the brand trust and awareness. Use this section to highlight your popular customers.
index_faq_bodyDescription: Answer your customers possible questions here, it will increase the conversion rate as well as support or chat requests.
cta_body: Don't let your visitors see a poor landing.
